properties.title: Natural trail Lago Ritom
properties.abstract: The natural trail at the Ritom Lake starts from the homonymous dam (on the left side) and goes through the "Pinet wood", among alpine pines and larches.
properties.description:
With a four hours walk you reach Cadagno and from here you return to the start point (Ritom dam) coasting the right side of the lake. This part of the lake, the sunniest one – unlike the opposite side –, is naked, without conifers. The forest limit between the two sides is about 300 meters high. It is to underline the snow protective effect during the springs frost on the side which is not exposed to the sun. The circular path is a real ecological excursion and give the opportunity to discover, thanks to a series of  biological and cultural points, some historical curiosities.

The natural trail at the Ritom Lake was inaugurated in 2009. At the same time it was also created  a pamphlet which presents the wood and the botanic is available at the funicular Ritom desk (from May until October) or at the tourist office of Leventina Turismo, Airolo.
